com.desperate.common

Class NoncePacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.desperate.common.NoncePacket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NoncePacket
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Packet created by the B entity in the second message of the Needham-Shroeder-revisited protocol. In message 7, B will receive this again, with the new Session Key inside, and verify the nonce it sent before is the same.
    Author:
    SIRS-RAR
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • sessionKey

        public javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec sessionKey
        Session key to be used in the session. Null when B created the packet. Contains the key when A returns the packet after getting the key from the KDC.
